attributes.comment:
I would like to voice my opposition to the proposed increase in fees as they will
affect international adoption. The international adoption process is already
extremely expensive and increasing fees will make this dream even more difficult
for families in the US hoping to adopt a child in need of a home and family.

If fees have not kept up with the actual costs over the years and there is no other
solution other than to raise fees then they should be raised in stages so as not to
present a hardship on families already stretched by the high costs involved in
international adoption.

Thank you for your consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Joyce E. Kasper
